last_episode_to_air.name: McCloud Meets Dracula
last_episode_to_air.overview: Murder victims are found to be drained of blood, and an elderly star of vampire films is suspected; Chief Clifford is on the hunt for a random sniper.

name: McCloud
overview: Deputy Marshal Sam McCloud of the small western town of Taos, New Mexico is assigned to the metropolitan New York City Police Department (NYPD) as a special investigator.

episodes.name: Portrait of a Dead Girl (or Who Killed Miss U.S.A.?)
episodes.overview: McCloud escorts a witness from New Mexico to New York City, but loses him to kidnappers and finds himself in a murder case involving Puerto Rican nationalists, a lady novelist, a Wall Street lawyer, and a dead beauty pageant winner.

episodes.name: Man from Taos (1) (or Who Says You Can't Make Friends in New York City?)
episodes.overview: McCloud goes to help a lady in distress, but gets caught in a shootout that sends him back to Taos on Chief Clifford's orders. At the last minute, the Chief is kidnapped to force McCloud to act as a courier to Paris.

episodes.name: Manhattan Manhunt (1) (or Horse Stealing on Fifth Avenue)
episodes.overview: McCloud is becoming famous thanks to press coverage. It doesn't endear him to the boys in blue, who have to deal with a string of drugstore holdups.

episodes.name: Murder Arena (1) (or The Concrete Corral)
episodes.overview: McCloud is assigned to shepherd the cowboys at a visiting rodeo. They're old friends, and one of them is killed by a jealous rival over a woman, it appears.

episodes.name: Manhattan Manhunt (2) (or The Stage Is All the World)
episodes.overview: McCloud, whose new-found celebrity (thanks to an article by Chris Coughlin in the Chronicle) vexes the Department, is assigned to protect a British theatrical maven who has received letters assailing his ""filthy, obscene"" productions and threatening his life.

episodes.name: Murder Arena (2) (or Walk in the Dark)
episodes.overview: McCloud complains about his assignment to rodeo detail, so Chief Clifford sends him to Special Auxiliary Force VI under the command of Sgt. Dameron, where he works to catch a murderer in Central Park.

episodes.name: Man from Taos (2) (or Our Man in Paris)
episodes.overview: In Paris, McCloud and a stewardess try to locate a mysterious arms smuggler with ties to an American mogul and a New York gubernatorial candidate.

episodes.name: Encounter with Aries
episodes.overview: The wife of an astrologer and widely-syndicated newspaper columnist is kidnapped in broad daylight.

episodes.name: Top of the World, Ma!
episodes.overview: A football player from Ohio who needs an operation goes to find the New York mobster who owes him money.

episodes.name: Somebody's Out to Get Jennie
episodes.overview: An industrial engineer is thought to have been died in an air crash, and his secretary is driven into a mental hospital.

episodes.name: The Disposal Man
episodes.overview: A nabob is menaced by a professional killer with an unknown employer.

episodes.name: A Little Plot at Tranquil Valley
episodes.overview: Stolen penicillin is diluted and sent south of the border by the director of a famous cemetery.

episodes.name: Fifth Man in a String Quartet
episodes.overview: A musician is framed for the killing of his teacher, a violinist whose long-lost brother was in the mob.

episodes.name: Give My Regrets to Broadway
episodes.overview: A Broadway producer is implicated in the murder of a detective investigating his business practices.

episodes.name: The New Mexican Connection
episodes.overview: A TV commentator's critique of police shootings tarnishes the department's stakeout squad, and Chris Coughlin is threatened to force the release of a murder suspect extradited to Taos by McCloud.

episodes.name: The Barefoot Stewardess Caper
episodes.overview: A bevy of international stewardesses have a second career as cat burglars.

episodes.name: The Park Avenue Rustlers
episodes.overview: As part of a pilot program, McCloud is assigned a female partner, and the two go undercover against a big-time auto theft ring.

episodes.name: Showdown at the End of the World
episodes.overview: An ambitious junior executive in the mob uses fashion models to transport heroin into New York.

episodes.name: The Million Dollar Round Up
episodes.overview: A dying Roman mobster wills his ""Saracen Horse,"" a jewel-encrusted green jade treasure, to any of his criminal colleagues who can take possession of it.

episodes.name: Butch Cassidy Rides Again
episodes.overview: The NYPD demonstrates a bank robbery on live closed-circuit TV, and is bushwhacked by a gang of antiquated outlaws.

episodes.name: The Solid Gold Swingers
episodes.overview: While answering a high-rise apartment burglary call, McCloud stumbles on a body, which then disappears. The case leads to a VIP madam under indictment, whose girls are apparently being murdered by a serial killer.

episodes.name: A Cowboy in Paradise
episodes.overview: Just before presenting a rackets case, Chief Clifford goes to Hawaii for a police conference. Taos sends McCloud, too, and the Marshal is obliged to dragoon a vacationing N.Y. policewoman when the Chief is set up on a murder charge.

episodes.name: The Colorado Cattle Caper
episodes.overview: Modern-day cattle rustlers ship lethally contaminated beef to New York.

episodes.name: This Must Be the Alamo
episodes.overview: During a heat wave, Chief Clifford is called away and leaves Sgt. Broadhurst in charge. A football gambling ring that scores with ""inside dope on injuries"" loses a little black book and begins eliminating witnesses in a search for it, leading to an assault on precinct headquarters.

episodes.name: The Barefoot Girls of Bleecker Street
episodes.overview: McCloud helps a runaway and her baby, amidst a curious stolen property investigation.

episodes.name: The Gang That Stole Manhattan
episodes.overview: McCloud is assigned to a film shoot, and suspects the production is a front.

episodes.name: Shivaree on Delancy Street
episodes.overview:
A tailor wins big on the numbers, but gang wars interfere with the payout. Sgt. Broadhurst is badly wounded and numbers money is planted on him, causing him to be investigated by Internal Affairs.

The tailor becomes a witness in the wars, but heads off to Miami Beach with his winnings and his shiksa fiancÃ©e, followed by two hit men and McCloud.

episodes.name: The 42nd Street Cavalry
episodes.overview: McCloud's lackluster assignments make him grouse, so Chief Clifford sends him to the Mounted Unit. A fence sets up a munitions theft at a National Guard Armory (USMC) for a revolutionary group, and the cavalry is on its way.

episodes.name: The Concrete Jungle Caper
episodes.overview: The international drug trade and a dealer named Harry Hague have McCloud undercover and in prison to root out the Rhigas family of distributors.

episodes.name: The Man with the Golden Hat
episodes.overview: After hanging his Stetson in a diner one night, McCloud is stymied by various attempts to relieve him of it. His clues lead to a ballet company on the verge of folding, and a philanthropic foundation with millions of dollars missing from its account books.

episodes.name: Lady on the Run
episodes.overview: A woman pursues the hit man who killed her sister, and in Mexico City is pursued herself.

episodes.name: Sharks!
episodes.overview: Loan sharks accidentally kill a welcher, and a hardnosed Homicide lieutenant has the wrong man.

episodes.name: Return to the Alamo
episodes.overview: On the graveyard shift one lengthy night, Chief Clifford and much of the staff are out with the flu, the American Brotherhood Movement is blowing up buildings, Chris Coughlin is writing a story with a feminist angle on the NYPD, a robbery suspect's brother (an addict) tries to break him out (and both are sons of an Albany bigwig) by kidnapping the Acting Watch Commander (Sgt. Broadhurst), McCloud pulls in New York's top drug dealers in a citywide search for a junkie whose addicted newborn infant needs urgent treatment, and Sgt. Phyllis Norton is the Acting Deputy Watch Commander in charge.

episodes.name: Park Avenue Pirates
episodes.overview: Racketeers take over a record company.

episodes.name: Showdown at Times Square
episodes.overview: The Chief (Clifford) is running a weekly bull session, that is, the detectives squawk and he gives them a talk. McCloud notices smoke signals coming from a nearby roof. The Chief (Stillwater) is seeking his grandson Johnny, who has followed a gang of thieves to New York. Johnny's father is in jail back home in Phoenix, framed by the gang.

episodes.name: Fire!
episodes.overview: Chris Coughlin's high-rise apartment building is torched by an arsonist for hire.

episodes.name: Three Guns for New York
episodes.overview: Paroled bank robbers from New Mexico think McCloud took off with their $400,000 twelve years before. They kidnap Chris Coughlin, shoot two FBI agents with McCloud's .45 Colt Frontier Six Shooter, and force him back to Taos after the money.

episodes.name: Our Man in the Harem
episodes.overview: A patrolman's daughter is held captive in the Middle East.

episodes.name: The Day New York Turned Blue
episodes.overview: During a New York City snowstorm, a union lawyer is placed in protective custody as a witness to graft, a working girl is slipping out-of-towners a mickey and painting them blue, a Federal Inspector is auditing the Department books, the mob plans an invasion of headquarters, and patrolmen have a strike meeting.

episodes.name: Night of the Shark
episodes.overview: The American mob plans an Australian expansion, with the help of a planted Chairman on Sydney's Police Board. McCloud, on airport duty at JFK, has a shootout with a hit man and goes to Sydney as a witness.

episodes.name: Bonnie and McCloud
episodes.overview: The head of a trucking company is killed before eyewitnesses, and McCloud's girlfriend is the culprit.

episodes.name: 'Twas the Fight Before Christmas...
episodes.overview: On Christmas Eve, an assassin stalks McCloud, a spurned mistress attempts suicide, a sidewalk Santa turns mugger, junkies raid a hospital pharmacy, Chris's newspaper organizes a party for orphans at Westside Hospital with Chief Clifford as Santa, and the junkies take hostages.

episodes.name: The Great Taxicab Stampede
episodes.overview: McCloud is framed for the murder of a drug-dealing hack, and exposes the ring.

episodes.name: The Moscow Connection
episodes.overview: The State Department sends Chief Clifford and McCloud to Moscow with a touring country & western singer, undercover.

episodes.name: London Bridges
episodes.overview: A peer of the realm, who's a photographer as well as a cat burglar, comes to America and, in flagrante delicto at a Long Island costume party, witnesses a killing at the hands of Irish bombers, all of which sends McCloud to Blighty, where the target remains to be found.

episodes.name: McCloud Meets Dracula
episodes.overview: Murder victims are found to be drained of blood, and an elderly star of vampire films is suspected; Chief Clifford is on the hunt for a random sniper.
